mil.nga.giat.geowave.core.geotime.store.query

Class SpatialTemporalQuery

  • java.lang.Object
    • mil.nga.giat.geowave.core.store.query.BasicQuery
      • mil.nga.giat.geowave.core.geotime.store.query.SpatialQuery
        • mil.nga.giat.geowave.core.geotime.store.query.SpatialTemporalQuery
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Persistable, DistributableQuery, Query

    public class SpatialTemporalQuery
extends SpatialQuery
    The Spatial Temporal Query class represents a query in three dimensions. The constraint that is applied represents an intersection operation on the query geometry AND a date range intersection based on startTime and endTime.

    • Nested Class Summary
